# The Stone Furnace is now working and has started smelting the iron ore. It currently has 9 iron ores left to process and 4 coal remaining as fuel.
# I will wait for the smelting process to complete and check back on the furnace after a short period.

# 1. Wait for the smelting process to finish (up to 30 seconds).
for _ in range(30):
    if inspect_inventory(get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})[0])[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 1:
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# 2. After waiting, check the inventory to see if I have any iron plates.
print(f"Inventory after smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")
